name: BiLira
reason: The dominant Turkish Lira stablecoin on blockchain. Connects DeFi to the Turkish banking system. Moderate centralization due to the issuer's control over reserves.

name: BRZ Token
reason: The largest stablecoin backed by the Brazilian Real. Essential infrastructure for Latin American crypto adoption, maintained by Transfero Swiss.

name: Zebec Network
reason: Protocol enabling continuous money streaming and payroll. Recently migrated from ZBC. Strong utility in real-world payments, with moderate insider governance control.

name: SolCard
reason: Project offering KYC-free crypto debit cards. The token captures fees from card usage. High regulatory risk profile and anonymous team increase the friction score.

name: Allbridge
reason: Facilitates cross-chain transfers between EVM and non-EVM chains. Critical plumbing for capital efficiency, though bridge smart contract risks apply.

name: Parallel
reason: Decentralized algorithmic stablecoin pegged to the Euro, backed by over-collateralized assets. Offers a censorship-resistant alternative to fiat-backed stables.

name: Yawww
reason: Peer-to-peer NFT lending and escrow service. One of the first to offer secure swapping. High insider score due to team concentration and smaller liquidity pools.
